reviews.review_msg: 2 Midterms, 1 final, and and online assignments. This is a very tough class, and Shora does her best to make Microecon concepts easy to understand. This was the only class that i had to work my tail off, you will learn alot about economics and how it applies in the real world. This isnt an easy A class... but i would take her again in a heartbeat.
